title: Unable to flash to factory image, post install failure for Android 12. "Cannot find valid OS"
content:
I tried to install Andriod 12 developer preview on my Pixel 4a, after reaching around 94% the update failed. 
When the phone rebooted I get the message "Cannot find valid operating system, The device will not start"
I am trying to flash the phone as per g.co/ABH but as its OEM locked, I keep on getting error. 

Is there a way to recover from this ? or is my phone bricked?
